metadata.title: CVE-2013-7470 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
cipso_v4_validate in include/net/cipso_ipv4.h in the Linux kernel before3.11.7, when CONFIG_NETLABEL is disabled, allows attackers to cause adenial of service (infinite loop and crash), as demonstrated by icmpsic, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2013-0310.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7470` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.12.0-1.3
linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic-lpae - 3.12.0-1.3
linux-image-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.12.0-1.3
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500 - 3.12.0-1.3
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500mc - 3.12.0-1.3
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-smp - 3.12.0-1.3
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-emb - 3.12.0-1.3
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-smp - 3.12.0-1.3
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.12.0-1.3
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.12.0-1.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1054-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1059-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
